neighbors.name: Bill D. Gaiche
neighbors.claims: Bill D. Gaiche is a resident of Chouteau in Mayes County ([National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/g/bill-gaiche/)). He is an angler who has participated in regional fishing tournaments, including a Major League Fishing event in 1999 ([Major League Fishing](https://majorleaguefishing.com/anglers/bill-gaiche-101602/)). No record was found of Gaiche taking part in local government meetings or public debates on development as of the latest available information.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident; no public office found

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a local outdoors enthusiast or conservation representative reach out to discuss how the project can preserve the quiet, natural environment he enjoys. Emphasize habitat protection and minimal disruption to fishing and wildlife.

citations.claim: Bill D. Gaiche is a resident of Chouteau in Mayes County
citations.title: Bill Gaiche - Chouteau, OK Public Record

citations.claim: Participated in a regional fishing tournament in 1999
citations.title: Bill Gaiche Angler Profile - Major League Fishing

neighbors.name: Lyndsi Hellard & Devon Looney
neighbors.claims: Lyndsi Hellard serves as the Director of Operations for Amalgapolitan (Amalgamated Metropolitan Properties), a commercial real estate firm ([Amalgapolitan](https://amalgapolitan.com/our-principals)). Her professional background includes overseeing acquisition and disposition processes for properties across multiple states ([Amalgapolitan](https://amalgapolitan.com/our-principals)). Devon Looney is listed as a co-owner of the parcel; no notable public profile regarding local development issues was found for either individual in Mayes County records.
neighbors.influence_justification: Non-resident professional owners; no local civic roles found

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via a professional channel — for example, a project development liaison — emphasizing how the proposal could enhance their land’s value and bring economic benefits. Since Hellard has a real estate background, use data-driven points about property and tax advantages.

citations.claim: Lyndsi Hellard serves as the Director of Operations for Amalgapolitan
citations.title: Amalgapolitan - Our Principals

citations.claim: Her professional background includes overseeing acquisition and disposition processes
citations.title: Amalgapolitan - Our Principals

neighbors.name: Vernon L. & Sandra Harrell
neighbors.claims: Vernon and Sandra Harrell are residents of the Chouteau area in Mayes County, having participated in local community events such as the Pryor Creek Open Championship ([Golf Oklahoma](https://golfoklahoma.org/bowman-wins-pryor-creek-championship/)). The Harrells have not been identified in any news reports or public meetings related to local development, indicating a low public profile regarding land use issues.

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a respected local farmer or agricultural extension agent approach them to discuss how the project will protect farmland and maintain the peace of the countryside. Emphasize commitments to preserving their way of life and minimizing disturbance.

citations.claim: Vernon and Sandra Harrell are residents of the Chouteau area... participated in Pryor Creek Open Championship
citations.title: Bowman wins Pryor Creek Championship - Golf Oklahoma

neighbors.name: Teresa & Michael Carnes
neighbors.claims: Teresa and Michael Carnes are residents of the Chouteau/Rose area in Mayes County ([Echovita](https://www.echovita.com/us/obituaries/ok/twin-oaks/kaylee-brewer-13085430)). Teresa Carnes is a prominent community leader, serving as the Program Director and President of the Delaware County Community Partnership (DCCP), which serves Northeast Oklahoma including Delaware and Cherokee counties ([Cherokee County Health Services Council](https://www.cherokeecountyhealthservicescouncil.org/meet-our-team)). She was recognized as a 'Community Champion' by the Oklahoma Turning Point Council in 2022 for her leadership in community health and opioid response initiatives ([OK Turning Point](https://okturningpoint.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Community-Champion-bio-information.docx)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Program Director of regional community partnership; Community Champion awardee

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out through a community health or civic leader connection. Given Teresa's leadership in the Delaware County Community Partnership, frame the project in terms of regional community benefits, economic stability, and resources that support public health and safety initiatives.

citations.title: Obituary of Kaylee Brewer
